text: Ulvella is a genus of endophytic microalgae in the family Ulvellaceae. Accepted species of Ulvella include Ulvella leptochaeteBAST, F., BHUSHAN, S AND JOHN, A.A. 2014. DNA Barcoding of a new record of epi-endophytic green algae Ulvella leptochaete (Ulvellaceae, Chlorophyta) in India. Journal of Biosciences 39:711-716 ==References== ==External links== Category:Ulvales Category:Ulvophyceae genera
title: Ulvella (alga)
